title: STAYIN' ALIVE - A Kalista Support Montage
body:
I believe Kalista makes a great support for a large variety of reasons, but the biggest reason above all others about why she's so great in this role, is her ability to keep her ADC alive.

This video is a short montage I made showing Kalista's saving power.

EDIT: Since I just brought this thread back from the dead and new people are going to be seeing this, click here if you have any doubts, want to know what Kalista brings to the table as a support, and/or if you want to know what is good to build on support Kalista.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/tZLQEl7r-stayin-alive-a-kalista-support-montage?comment=0007000000000001
